item.title: Hugo Workshop (Setup Instructions)
item.description: Installing Chocolatey for Windows users To help our Window friends install Chocolatey first, this seems too tempting right now, but it is effortless. To install, press Super, type powershell, then run as “Administrator” and paste the following command. Set-ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Scope Process -Force; [System.Net.ServicePointManager]::SecurityProtocol = [System.Net.ServicePointManager]::SecurityProtocol -bor 3072; iex ((New-Object System.Net.WebClient).DownloadString('https://community.chocolatey.org/install.ps1')) Press enter. After this you have chocolatey. Installing Git Now we have a very powerfull package (yes, it is windows) choco.
